notes_translated.fr: Cette fiche propose les limites de divers anciens territoires administratifs de l’île de Montréal. Dans certains cas, ces territoires correspondaient à d’anciennes municipalités.
notes_translated.en-t-fr:
This fact sheet offers the boundaries of various former administrative territories of the Island of Montreal. In some cases, these territories corresponded to former municipalities.  
  
  **This third party metadata element was translated using an automated translation tool (Amazon Translate).**
